trans-unit.target: TEXT_STMBDZ520_02771_SEQ_00<tab>Sukegei has been abandoned by his favorite sheep.
TEXT_STMBDZ520_02771_TODO_00<tab>Use the blowgun to shoot the lost lamb from the designated location.
TEXT_STMBDZ520_02771_TODO_02<tab>Deliver the lost lamb to Sukegei.
TEXT_STMBDZ520_02771_SUKEGEI_000_000<tab>Don't suppose you have time to chase after a sheep do you? My most cowardly one just ran off after hearing a nearby beast's roar.
TEXT_STMBDZ520_02771_SUKEGEI_000_001<tab>She is so timid she is likely to run away if you try to approach her normally.
TEXT_STMBDZ520_02771_SUKEGEI_000_002<tab>Take this blowgun and these darts that I've laced with a sedative. One hit and she will be out in an instant. She ran off somewhere to the west. Best of luck!
TEXT_STMBDZ520_02771_SUKEGEI_000_010<tab>Use that blowgun I gave you to put my sheep to sleep. She ran off somewhere to the west. Best of luck!
TEXT_STMBDZ520_02771_SYSTEM_000_030<tab>The lost lamb is wary of your presence.
TEXT_STMBDZ520_02771_SUKEGEI_000_020<tab>You are going to need to put her to sleep first if you are to have any chance of catching her.
TEXT_STMBDZ520_02771_SUKEGEI_000_040<tab>Did you manage to catch my sheep?
TEXT_STMBDZ520_02771_SUKEGEI_000_041<tab>Oh, thank you! You had me worried sick you did, deary.
TEXT_STMBDZ520_02771_SUKEGEI_000_042<tab>This job means everything to me. It truly does.
TEXT_STMBDZ520_02771_SUKEGEI_000_043<tab>I was just a lonely orphan with nowhere to call my own when the Mol took me in. I said I would look after our sheep in an attempt to show my gratitude.
TEXT_STMBDZ520_02771_SUKEGEI_000_044<tab>My heart nearly stopped when this little one ran away. Sheep are the cornerstone of our tribe's way of life.
TEXT_STMBDZ520_02771_SUKEGEI_000_045<tab>I fear I will never be able to truly express my thanks to you, but know I am grateful.
